column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=( ( WSS ) )
#Text=On your campaign website , you propose a reinstatement of the Glass – Steagall Act and creation of an alternative Federal Reserve .
#Text=These require cooperation with Congress .
#Text=How can a president work with a hostile congress to accomplish these goals ?
#Text=Wolfe : Well , we still have money left .
#Text=The president has a lot of authority .
#Text=He has an army and things like that .
#Text=He has the federal reserve and things like he 's been giving to European banks , distributed to other countries .
#Text=We were told .
#Text=We did n't find out about until I guess six or seven months ago just how broad the money was and the way the Federal Reserve chose to prioritize and things like that .
#Text=So , why not give some of that to the community ?

#Text=If you 're gonna give Bank of America that uses this money to speculate an interest rate of one third of one percent , then why are n't these community banks down here working with people to do real things , why are n't they getting money instead ?
#Text=They should be .
#Text=|

#Text=I could sit here with a chart , put all this information up in probably 30 or 40 minutes in a national press conference and I guarantee you 70 percent of the people would approve of what I said , and we 'd have a whole new discourse in this country
#Text=And that 's why I 'm talking about there needs to be an alternative , when I say alternative federal reserve , a better way of putting would be the federal reserve needs to reform .
#Text=That 's the alternative that I would push for .
#Text=Because we have a lot of people here that do n't work .
#Text=These small towns have really been hurt by NAFTA .
#Text=A lot of factories have closed .
#Text=A lot of people do n't have anything to do .
#Text=A lot of people have turned to drugs .
#Text=I mean you got a lot of crystal meth problems in the school .

#Text=I 'm for enforcing the law and everything and the individual responsibility , however , we did n't have those sorts of problems at the scale we have now , when we had people in factories where people could work , and we had employment opportunities for those with just a high school education .
#Text=Now we do n't have so much of that anymore .
#Text=The economy basically has changed .
#Text=It 's now financial .
#Text=Forty percent of the profits in this country now are made by the financial sector .
#Text=It used to be different .
#Text=Factories used to make more .
#Text=Service industries used to make more of the national profits .
#Text=But now it 's the finance .
#Text=The finance does n't require so many people to do it .
#Text=That 's why the finance is basically based on computer trade , automated means , so human beings are superfluous .
#Text=Especially because its machines in factories and things that are so efficient .
#Text=So a lot of things are run by robots .
